explains: adj. 挪威的；挪威语的；挪威人的；挪威文化的

sentences.en: Norwegian whalers said yesterday they had harpooned a female minke whale.
sentences.cn: 挪威的捕鲸人昨天说他们用捕鲸叉捕获了一头雌性小须鲸。

sentences.en: The second category of Norwegian folk tale is the supernatural.
sentences.cn: 挪威民间故事的第二种类型是超自然。

sentences.en: Norwegian officials notified his wife in Mexico City at 4:00 a.m.
sentences.cn: 挪威官员于凌晨4点通知了他在墨西哥城的妻子。
